entry.title: “I don’t know who needs to hear this

link.title: “I don’t know who needs to hear this

entry.content:
Post 197515 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: While misuse, overreach and empty parroting of phrases and concepts meant to counter unexamined privilege and oppression can certainly become annoying ... this is a white male comedian mocking the efforts of pretty much every marginalized group to push back at a status quo that massively favors white male voices and opinions, which is probably not the greatest for Mefi. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 197515 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: While misuse, overreach and empty parroting of phrases and concepts meant to counter unexamined privilege and oppression can certainly become annoying ... this is a white male comedian mocking the efforts of pretty much every marginalized group to push back at a status quo that massively favors white male voices and opinions, which is probably not the greatest for Mefi. -- taz

entry.title: Can DeFi Save Indie Film?
entry.content:
Post 197327 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, this really isn't a framing for a post: written in the first person ("how I feel about it"), about a contentious topic; the premise seems sketchy and the post feels promotional; OP personal involvement. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 197327 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, this really isn't a framing for a post: written in the first person ("how I feel about it"), about a contentious topic; the premise seems sketchy and the post feels promotional; OP personal involvement. -- taz

entry.title: Vox Populi
entry.content:
Post 197257 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but we really have a glut of Musk / Twitter posts at the moment -- too many to easily keep track of for people just trying to keep up with latest news. Please check the twitter and musk tags, thank you! -- taz
entry.summary: Post 197257 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but we really have a glut of Musk / Twitter posts at the moment -- too many to easily keep track of for people just trying to keep up with latest news. Please check the twitter and musk tags, thank you! -- taz
